name: xaddid1d

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wceq(co(c0, cxad, nat0), c0), wcel(c0, cxr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cxad, nat0), c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cxr), wceq(co(c0, cxad, nat0), c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cxad, nat0), c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cxr), wceq(co(c0, cxad, nat0), c0))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cxr), wceq(co(c0, cxad, nat0), c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cxad, nat0), c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))

comment: ` 0 ` is a right identity for extended real addition. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
